Real Madrid and Dortmund agree Achraf loan deal - Bild

The operation to take the young full-back from LaLiga to the Bundesliga is almost finalised with the Moroccan planning a two-year spell with Lucien Favre's side.

Real Madrid to offer Cristiano Ronaldo vastly improved contract in bid to keep superstar at Bernabeu

Juventus want to sign the star in a €100million transfer coup but Madrid chiefs are to up their bid to keep hold of the world's greatest player.

The European champions' attempt to resolve their long standing dispute with the Portugal international follows the receipt of a €100million transfer proposal from Juventus.
